Uses of Class
co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task.ClusterTask

  • Packages that use ClusterTask 
    Package Description
    co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task
    Classes for coordinating tasks and jobs.
    co.cask.coopr.store.cluster
    Persistent store for clusters, jobs, tasks, and nodes.

    • Uses of ClusterTask in co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task

      Methods in co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task that return types with arguments of type ClusterTask 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ClusterTask> TaskService.getRetryTask(ClusterTask task)
      Get tasks that must be run in order to retry the given task that failed on a given node in a given cluster.
      Methods in co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task with parameters of type ClusterTask 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TaskService.completeTask(ClusterTask clusterTask, int status)
      Complete a task by setting the status of the task to ClusterTask.Status.COMPLETE and the status time to the current timestamp and the status code to the given code.
      void TaskService.dropTask(ClusterTask clusterTask)
      Drop a task by setting the status of the task to ClusterTask.Status.DROPPED and the status time to the current timestamp.
      void TaskService.failTask(ClusterTask clusterTask, int status)
      Fail a task by setting the status of the task to ClusterTask.Status.FAILED and the status time to the current timestamp and the status code to the given code.
      List<ClusterTask> TaskService.getRetryTask(ClusterTask task)
      Get tasks that must be run in order to retry the given task that failed on a given node in a given cluster.
      void TaskService.startTask(ClusterTask clusterTask)
      Starts a task by setting the status of the task to ClusterTask.Status.IN_PROGRESS and the submit time to the current timestamp.
      Constructors in co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task with parameters of type ClusterTask 
      Constructor and Description
      SchedulableTask(ClusterTask clusterTask, TaskConfig config)
